attributes.action: A No Deal Brexit must remain an option for the UK government
attributes.additional_details: If the government has it's hand tied in any way during the Trade Deal negotiations it will hinder there bargaining power.
attributes.background: The government must remain free to go forward with No Deal if necessary.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petitions:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/306862
